.. -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

.. _bob.db.brsu:

===============================================================
 Bob's interface for the BRSU Multispectral Face/Skin Database
===============================================================

This package contains an interface for the BRSU database, a face database
with face images of both *bonafide* examples and presentation attacks.

Each sample contains a color image and 4 SWIR images in the following bands:

- 935nm
- 1060nm
- 1300nm
- 1550nm


The data in the BRSU database is described in more details `here
<https://www.h-brs.de/en/isf/h-brs-haut-gesichts-und-faelschungs-datenbank>`_.
Note that at the end of this page, you can access a form to request the database.
